title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Virtual Reality-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Students with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in special needs education and foundational virtual reality technology understanding
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more customized educational strategies using virtual reality technology for students with disabilities.
Learners can evaluate virtual reality-based science education content according to the educational needs of students with disabilities.
Learners can propose solutions to accessibility issues that may arise when applying virtual reality, following flexible instructional design principles.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
